transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haanji Ajay ji, mai Kajal baat kar rahi hu. Sir aapne customer care number pe call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Accha tabhi aapka ek ticket raise ho gaya hai. Jo aapko abhi number dikh raha hai na abhi call call lagane pe ek number dikh raha hoga last me 516. Ye mera unique number hai sir. Ye aapka ticket raise ho jata hai isliye aapka yaha pe aisa number show nahi sakta hai. To sir aap customer care pe kabhi bhi aapko kuch bhi puchna hai aap customer care pe mat puchiye sir aap mere ko call kariye direct. Kyuki kya hota hai na agar bar bar ticket raise karega to ye aapki hi profile pe fir negative chije show hoti hai, thik hai? Ji ji. To is bar se aap mere ko direct call karo aap customer care pe mat karo sir. Kyuki isse thoda bhi lamba process bhi ho jayega. Aap customer care pe karoge then wo call bhi mujhe forward hogi isse better hai aap sidhe mujhe call kar lo. Thik hai? Ji ji.
Customer: Accha accha.
Executive: Haan sir. To koi baat nahi abhi mai aapka ticket close kar dungi, thik hai? To wo aapke nahi dikhega ye number. Ji ji ji.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Ji baki sir dekhiye maine aapko bataya tha aapko fir maine ye chij bhi boli thi ki 12 baj ke mai aapke bhi competitor se dekh lo sir kyuki offer aapko mil jayega. Madam ji aap aap hamari baat suniye ek baat. Ji. Aap ghuma fira kar ke matlab baat na bataiye, thik hai? Ispasht aapko bata rahe hai usme humko karana nahi hai madam ji na. Dekhiye sir aapke liye benefit hai. Aapki aapki shikayat ke liye humne matlab us pe number lagaya tha. Accha. Ki aap humko pareshan kar rahi hai. Are sir aisi kaisi baate kar rahe ho sir aap? Nahi nahi aisi aisi hi baat hai na? To sir aap itna itna nahi nahi jitna matlab itna bata rahi hai agar itne me agar aap koi business pe dhyan di hoti ab tak kuch na kuch business ho gaya hota madam ji na. Ji. Jitna focus matlab usme kar rahi hai aap judne ke liye. Ji. Ji ji. Business me to mai aapko bol hi rahi hu sir business to kuch nahi hai business me to jitna aap active rahoge fir ek na ek din bhi jana hai aapko business. Aap kitne lagaye 33000 33000 lagaye na bhai ek saal ke andar aapko usse jyada accha profit milega ye aap mere se likh ke le lo. Ji ji. Ji ji. Thik hai? Baki mai agar jitna aap wait kar rahe ho utna wait nahi karna padega agar aap service upgrade karate baki mai force nahi kar rahi hu ye chij aap mere ko bol rahe the ki aap force mat kariye madam. Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want to be contacted again.



Resolution:

- Executive will close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, customer care, business
